scenarios.title: Verify user can login with valid credentials
preconditions: User account exists in the system
Browser is open and navigated to login page

testSteps.expectedResult: Login page displays with username and password fields visible

testSteps.action: Enter valid username in the username field
testSteps.expectedResult: Username is accepted and displayed clearly in the field

testSteps.action: Enter valid password in the password field
testSteps.expectedResult: Password characters are masked with asterisks or dots
System validates credentials and redirects user to dashboard page
Dashboard displays with user-specific content and navigation options

scenarios.title: Verify login fails with invalid username
preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to login page
Invalid username test data is available

testSteps.expectedResult: Login page displays with username and password fields visible

testSteps.action: Enter invalid username in the username field
testSteps.expectedResult: Invalid username is displayed in the field

testSteps.action: Enter valid password in the password field
testSteps.expectedResult: Password characters are masked with asterisks or dots
System displays error message indicating invalid credentials

testSteps.action: Verify user remains on login page
testSteps.expectedResult: User is not redirected and stays on the login page

scenarios.title: Verify password masking functionality
preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to login page

testSteps.expectedResult: Login page displays with username and password fields visible

testSteps.action: Click in the password field to focus
testSteps.expectedResult: Password field is focused and cursor is active

testSteps.action: Type characters one by one in the password field
testSteps.expectedResult: Each character typed is immediately masked with asterisks or dots

testSteps.action: Verify complete password is fully masked
testSteps.expectedResult: All password characters are hidden and displayed as masked characters

testSteps.action: Right-click on password field and check context menu
testSteps.expectedResult: Copy/paste options should be restricted or password remains masked

scenarios.title: Verify remember me functionality when checked
preconditions: Valid user account exists in the system
Browser is open and navigated to login page
Remember me checkbox is available on login page

testSteps.expectedResult: Login page displays with username, password fields and remember me checkbox

testSteps.action: Enter valid username in the username field
testSteps.expectedResult: Username is displayed in the field

testSteps.action: Enter valid password in the password field
testSteps.expectedResult: Password characters are masked
Remember me checkbox is checked/selected
User is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard

testSteps.action: Close browser and reopen, navigate to login page
testSteps.expectedResult: Username field should be pre-filled or user should remain logged in
